#include <iostream>

using namespace std;


int main(){
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while (t--) {
        bool yes = true;
        long long int start, end;
        cin>>start>>end;
        
        int n;      //No of cases
        cin>>n;
        
        while (n--) {
            long long int t1, t2;
            cin>>t1>>t2;
            if ((t1>start && t1<end) || (t2<end && t2>start))
                yes = false;
    }
        if (yes==true) {
            cout<<"YES"<<endl;
        }
        else
            cout<<"NO"<<endl;
}

    return 0;
}
